# SecureStringExtensions.Disposed method

Determines whether input secure string is disposed.

```csharp
public static bool Disposed(this SecureString target)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | Input secure string. |

## Return Value

true if input secure string is disposed; Otherwise false.
